description: Only shows blank page with any document. Ubuntu 20.04

No configuration settings, no help, no user guides.
Does have display sizing (- or = key, with SHIFT to reverse), page choices (HOME, #). PG-UP, PG-DN.
Sioyek (20/8/22) might have other powers?
Cannot show two pages side-by-side.
Wanting in Linux, similar to Windows: FOXIT READER.
Good features, smooth, overall a great reading paper app.
summary: Great app for reading research papers
